name: devarp-inventory
description: Devarp Stok ve Üretim Yönetimi Sistemi

scripts.build: cd frontend && npm install && npm run build
scripts.dev: concurrently "cd backend && npm run dev" "cd frontend && npm start"
scripts.install-all: cd backend && npm install && cd ../frontend && npm install
scripts.test: concurrently "cd backend && npm test" "cd frontend && npm run test:ci"
scripts.test:coverage: concurrently "cd backend && npm run test:coverage" "cd frontend && npm run test:coverage"
scripts.lint: concurrently "cd backend && npm run lint" "cd frontend && npm run lint"
scripts.lint:fix: concurrently "cd backend && npm run lint:fix" "cd frontend && npm run lint:fix"
scripts.format: concurrently "cd backend && npm run format" "cd frontend && npm run format"
scripts.format:check: concurrently "cd backend && npm run format:check" "cd frontend && npm run format:check"

author: Devarp Team
